# biodivercity <a href='https://ecological-cities.github.io/biodivercity/'><img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="139" /></a>

Assess the diversity of animal species in urban areas. Refer to [package website](https://ecological-cities.github.io/biodivercity/) for demonstrations of how the package may be used.


## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` {r eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ecological-cities/biodivercity", ref = "main")
```

## Setup

Load the package:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(biodivercity)
```

```{r include = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
devtools::load_all() # to knit manually w latest changes (not built/installed yet)
```
